1.content:
The alarm clock rang that morning, obnoxiously loud. "Damn thing," you said to yourself. You shut off the alarm and looked at it. 10:00 am. That's the time you usually woke up.

You got up, still drowsy, and hopped into the shower, replaying the dream you just had in your mind.

You got out and jumped into a tshirt, jeans, and sneakers, and grabbed your coat to get breakfast at McDonalds.

"Can I really do all that the voice told me? No...it's impossible..." you say to yourself. "It's just a dream anyway..."

You locked the front door behind you and started walking towards the McDonalds that was only a few blocks away, still pondering...

"What the hell, if it isn't real, it's not like I'll die or anything..." you say to yourself, still walking in the direction of the fast food restaurant.

Which should you test out?
1.title: Just a dream?

choices: A woman about to have her wedding.
A teenage cheerleader on her way to school.
A man in a business suit.
11.content:
"Shapeshifting..." you say to yourself.

You replayed what the voice said in your mind. You can shapeshift into anyone you want just by focusing and snapping your fingers, and whoever you shapeshift into will turn into you, assuming they've always looked like that. So any physical problems, whether it be a drunk person or somebody in a cast, won't be shifted over to you. Instead, that person will now appear as you, with whatever problem they originally had.

Same went for vice versa; if you yourself were drunk in somebody else's form, taking on another or getting your original form back will not sober you up.

And if you were in person A's form and shapeshifted into person B, person A would get their form back, and person B will end up looking like you.

You glanced at ____ and shapeshifted into them.
11.title: Shape shifting

choices: Stay as the little girl for now.
Find someone else to swap with.
You run into someone you know.
111.content:
As you walked onto the parking lot of the restaurant, you walked past a mother and her daughter. Curious to see how it'd work, you concentrated on the little girl and snapped your fingers.

The result made you chuckle.

"Mommy, I want a happy meal!" said your old body, looking at her mother, who was now two inches shorter then her daughter.

"Honey, I told you, they're only serving breakfast right now," said the mom politely, holding your old body's hand towards the restaurant.

"But I want a happy meal!" yelled the little girl in her guyish voice, stomping her foot.

You walked towards McDonalds, grinning. You now had the body of that little girl. You looked down at yourself, smiling at the pink dress you now wore.

You walked into the restaurant and made your order.
111.title: A little girl.

choices: Too girly for me! Swap back to yourself and find another body.
Eh, it's fine. Step out and try to find someone who knows you.
1111.content:
While eating your two big macs and large fries and soda (a meal that normally a little girl would never be able to consume) you remembered how when you shapeshift, reality bends so it's as if you were always in that form.

Finishing up your meal, you walked home and entered your bedroom.

Despite the fact you would never in a million years be into this stuff, your bedroom was lined with dolls, pink, and flowers. Even your closet now had little girl clothing.
1111.title: Stay as the little girl for now.

11112.content:
With a look of surprise you close the door of your now pink, pretty, and girly room. With how reality has been altered you wonder if that little girl now had a room just like yours.

You walk downstairs and you are amazed at how big everything is with your tiny body. Then you thought of something. If reality changed for your room, would your relationships and how your friends and family treat you be different?

You put on your shoes and go to see....
11112.title: Eh, it's fine. Step out and try to find som...

choices: Tough it out as a little girl and learn more about your power
111121.content:
You aren’t sure how the reality has changed your relationships. You decide to test it out and head to your best friend Craig’s house. He luckily only lives a few houses away. You knock on his door and he answers. You look up at him smiling and say, “Hey Craig! How’s it going? Want to play some basketball?”

Craig looks down at you and laughs, “You aren’t exactly wearing basketball clothes.”

You look down at your pink dress and mary jane shoes and realize he is right. You still wonder if he knows who you are and say, “Okay. Then maybe we can look at comic books?”

Craig looks at you funny and asks, “What gives?”

Craig’s Mom comes up smiling, “Leave her alone Craig!” Craig’s Mom whispers in his ear, “It sounds like somebody has a crush on you!”

Craig shakes his head and walks away. His Mom smiles at you and says, “Christine is in her room! She was hoping you would come over to play!”

“Christine?” You think to yourself. That was Craig’s kid sister. You quickly figure out in this reality that Craig isn’t your best friend. You are now friends with Christine instead. Christine runs up to give you a hug and you hug her back. She grabs your hand and says, “Come on! Let’s go play!”

You can easily shapeshift again to get out of this reality. However, if you stay like this, you might learn more about the powers. You decide to…….
111121.title: Your best friend

112.content: You soon concentrate on the young woman in the wedding dress standing in front of the church, taking pictures with her new husband. Slowly but surely, her long brown hair recedes into her scalp becoming the hair cut you had. Her eyes continually blink from blue to brown your eye color. Her face stretches and flexes many times until settling into your face. Her dress morph with her changes becoming your clothes. She continues to pose for pictures, with even her husband thinking she's always looked like an 18 year old male. You grin and continue towards McDonalds in her wedding dress and her body.
112.title: Wedding Bells

choices: A teenage cheerleader on her way to school
1122.title: Shapeshift into someone else.

choices: Follow the cheerleader and shapeshift back into yourself.
Keep your new body and go to a friend's house.
113.content:
"I can't see this crap working!" you mumbled to yourself skeptically, before clicking your fingers and looking at a cheerleader across the street who was on her way to school. Suddenly you felt a strange tingling sensation throughout your body and you looked down at yourself to see an amazing sight. You shrank several inches in height, your jeans morphed into a short red & white skirt, your grubby sneakers changed into a pair of white girl's sneakers, your socks turned into girl's socks and your t-shirt morphed into a tight fitting top that matched your skirt. Even more amazing were the changes to your body, your feet became much smaller, your legs became smooth and very shapely, your hips grew outwards...becoming extremely curvy, and your ass filled out considerably as you felt a distinct 'sucking' sensation in your crotch. And as you held your now manicured hands out in front of you...you felt...and saw two mounds of flesh grow from your chest, filling out your top. The final change was your head, your features became feminine and your hair grew long, turned black and shifted itself up into a ponytail.

"Jesus Christ!!!" you said, as you reached up to feel your new breasts and your toned stomach, and after another few seconds you slipped a hand into your skirt and probed the distinct outline of a vagina through your panties.

Glancing across the street at the girl you saw that she now looked exactly like you, right down to the t-shirt, jeans and sneakers she now wore. Yet she continued on her way as though nothing was wrong, as if...she had always looked like an 18-year old guy. "Wow!" you muttered to yourself in your new sing song voice. Your new body couldn't have been much over 16 years old, and was extremely feminine, even sexy! You couldn't believe what had happened, your new power was indeed real.

As the teenage 'girl' disappeared around the corner of the street, you looked around, wondering what you should do next, it was quite a decision.....
113.title: A teenage cheerleader on her way to school.

choices: think before doing the next step
1132.content: This was so amazing and you thought that you have to share this with your best friend, Jason. So you take your bike and ride over to him. While riding bike you think that in this cheerleader outfit riding bike is not very good, so you concentrate again and feel your clothing shifting into the desired new outfit, which is girls cut jeans and just a casual blouse. The rest remains and after some moments you arrive at Jason's home and approach the house in form of a beautiful girl….
1132.title: Keep your new body and go to a friend's house.

11321.content:
You hesitantly reach for the doorbell, and after it rings a couple of times the door opens. "Yo, Jamie! What's up, girl?" Jason asks as he lets you in. You're a little weirded out that he didn't have any sort of strange reaction, but you let it go. Apparently your shifting does something to reality to adjust for the changes, and you silently thank your parents for giving you a name which can easily be turned into a girls' name. As you walk into the living room of his house, you are greeted by his little sister Shania and his mother, who both go back to respectively My Little Pony and a romance novel. They too appear to have no reaction to your new form, strange as it all appears to you it seems perfectly normal to them. This requires looking into at a later time.

You plop down onto Jason's bed, and kick off the sneakers you are wearing underneath the cheerleader uniform. He tosses you a Mountain Dew and you deftly catch it before opening it and taking a swig. "So, what brings you here all of a sudden?", he asks, "Yesterday you mentioned having to buy some new shoes, you done with that yet?". Slightly confused, you think back and remember both not saying that and saying it. Perhaps this shifting thing also adapted reality in other ways, to help you fit into the new role better? Thinking quickly you reply "No, not really. Thought I'd pop by here first, see what's up with you". And before you can catch yourself, you say "You know, maybe you could come along when I go buy shoes. I don't know the town all that well yet and I could use the company". Blushing furiously, you feel like sinking into the ground but Jason appears not to notice, and instead puts on some cargo shorts and sneakers and gets up. "Alright, I'm game. Let's go!" he says, before walking out of the door, quickly followed by you.
11321.title: ring

choices: yes, it is my best buddy....
113212.content:
On the way there you suddenly see your old body, who is just coming out of school, which is nearby the mall.
Now you need to test how good this new shape shifting power works and how deep reality is altered around:
First you ask Jason pointing at your old body: “Do you know this guy?”
113212.title: On the way there

choices: A girl with her boyfriend, or her boyfriend
1133.content: As much as you enjoyed being in a hot cheerleader's body, you decided to try your power more by shapeshifting into someone else, so you start looking around.
1133.title: Try shapeshifting into somebody else.

11332.content: I think it meant to say boyfriend or girlfriend(?). So girl w/ boyfriend or girlfriend?
11332.title: A girl with her boyfriend, or her boyfriend

choices: Shapeshifted into the woman in the skirt suit.
Forget them, there's someone else I see that I'd like to look like!
114.content:
You focused on the man and shapeshifted into him.

It amused you to see your old body acting an actual adult, making important phone calls and everything.

"I so hope I don't end up that stuck up when I'm older," you said to yourself in the mans body.

You looked at the people he was with and...
114.title: A man in a business suit.

choices: Shapeshifted into the punk rock girl next to him.
Left them alone and went into the restaurant.
Wait, there's someone I want to become!
115.content:
You concentrated and snapped your fingers and instantly laughed at what you saw.
Your old body was headbanging to the headphones it now sported.

You looked into a mirror from a car and saw the punk rock teenager was looking back at you. You grinned and looked back, and...
115.title: A teenage punk rock guy.

choices: Have him give you all of his money.
Have him tell you all of his personal secrets.
Have him act like and think he's your girlfriend.
Have him act like and think he's a preppy teenage girl.
Have him act like and think he's your mother.
12.content:
"Mind control..." you say to yourself.

You replayed what the voice said in your mind. You can mind control others just by focusing and snapping your fingers. And whatever they do or think will stay with them until you snap your fingers again and make them stop.

"Sounds simple enough," you say to yourself.

You walked into McDonalds and found a man in a business suit having a cup of coffee and reading a newspaper. You decided to test this out on him, but what will you have him do?
12.title: Mind control

choices: The person who was about to call the cops stops and now worships you
Everyone who was watching has forgotten about everything that they saw
You take over the minds of everyone there...and have fun at their expense
121.content:
Although it felt kind of wrong, you decided you needed some quick cash. And so, you tested your newfound power on this poor innocent man. *Snap*

The man came straight up to you, and emptied his pockets for you. He left a LOT of money on the ground for you. A lot...like thousands of dollars. But that was nothing in comparison to the wallet he then gave you with what seemed to be hundreds of thousands of dollars. He must not have done too bad for himself in his job...though all proceeds from his work were now coming to you.

However, people were watching this happen. Realizing one was about to call the cops...*snap*...
121.title: Have him give you all of his money.

choices: Continue playing mind games with them.
Stop controlling them and leave the resturant with your bag of money.
1213.content:
You instantly took control of everyone in the restaurant. They all stood there, their faces lifeless, looking as if someone had just scooped the brains of out their heads.

You ordered one of the employees to lock the restaurant door and close all the windows, blinds, everything, so people would think the restaurant's closed, leaving you to have fun without any interruption.

"Okay..." you said. You grabbed a bag from the counter and placed it in the middle of the restaurant. "Okay, everyone, give me all the money you have and place it into that bag."

Instantly, everyone started fumbling through their wallets and purses, taking out any cash they had on you and placing it in the bag.

"Good," you said to them. You observed everyone and noticed one of the people in the room was a drop-dead-gorgeous girl from your old high school. She never gave you the time of day, always thinking you're some gross creep.

"You, come here."
She walked over to you and stared blankly into space. You groped her with a smile, amused at the fact she just stood there and took it.

Half an hour later, you finished having your way with her. You told her to go back to sit down, and you looked at everyone.

You grinned. "All of you. You are still under my control, but you will now act as if you aren't. However, you all now have the personalities of the opposite gender."

They all went back to what they were doing, but things were different.

You glanced over at a group of 12 year old girl scouts who were now behaving like 16 year old jock boys; sitting like them, acting like them, everything.

"Dude, I totally banged this hot cheerleader last night," said a little girl.
"Damn bro, that's awesome!" said another, her legs spread apart and laid back.

In another part of the restaurant were nerdy 18 year olds who were now doing their make up and flat out talking like cheerleaders."

"Ugh, oh my god I'm so fat," said a fat nerd in his husky, deep voice.
"Oh my god you should totally join me at the gym later today!" said a lanky, skinny boy sitting across from him.

"Now, what should I have you do next..."
1213.title: You take over the minds of everyone there...and...

12131.content:
It was fun for a good 30 minutes seeing everyone act as the opposite gender and wrong age, but still, there was much you could do. The fact everyone in the restaurant was under your command without question was exciting. The possibilities were near infinite! The best part was the fact you did it seamlessly as well. Literally, whatever you imagined them doing, they did.

You thought hard and returned everyone back to their blank states. The entire place went so silent you could hear a pin drop. You decided to bring some normalcy back to the restaurant, keyword being SOME. The workers went back to making food, and people started to purchase more food, or even repeat their order. In just a few moments, the place was bustling again despite the only lights on were from the displays and whatever sunlight came in through the closed shades. It did almost look like everyone went back to normal, but of course, your mind control made people do some strange things.


One older woman in business attire picked up her chicken wrap meal from the counter and was ready to eat. She stopped however when she saw the entire thing. She was a bit frustrated and went up to the clerk at the counter.

"Excuse me sir, I asked for semen on my chicken wrap!" She said scolding the worker. "Fix this or give me a refund!"

The worker was a large sweating man barely fitting into his uniform, not attractive in the least bit. He complied with her command and immediately dropped his pants and grabbed the chicken wrap. It took him a few moments of furiously beating his cock but eventually he ejaculated right on her food. He made sure to get as much semen as he could all over it before returning it to her. She gave a polite smile and bit down into the food, enjoying it.

You walked back to a small kid's area and found 3 grown men playing with dolls. They giggled and compared the toys they believed to come from the kid's meals they ordered.

"Oh my gosh! This one has purple hair!" One of the men squealed.

"Share Becky! I wanna play with it!" Another one whined.

They started to fight in the small corner and caused a lot of commotion, yet no one stopped them .

Nearby there seemed to be teenage girl fixated on rubbing her ass against things. Her tight leggings showcased a very plump butt, which she smushed against any surface she could. Eventually she found her way to the table of a family enjoying food together. Like it was okay, she rubbed her butt on the father of the family. He did the best he could to keep eating and not a single person in the family acknowledged the stranger
12131.title: Continue playing mind games with them.

choices: A hot early 20s (feminine) woman thinks she's your (very manly) father.
A hot teenage cheerleader girl thinks she's your...boyfriend?
A big, manly jock high schooler thinks he's your little 10 year old sister.
125.content:
"Oh James, come sit down already, I already ordered!"

You stared at him, wondering if it worked.

"What, too grown up to sit next to your own mother anymore?"

Yup, it worked.

You sat down next to the man who thought he was your mother as he brought food to the table.

What the hell, free food, might as well see where this goes.

The man was sitting rather femininely, treating you as his own son, acting, or rather, seriously thinking he's your mother.

"So mom..." you started. "Is it time to go back home?"

"Oh, yes, it is, I need to start on chores! I don't know why I decided to wear a suit today, I don't even work!"

As you were exiting the the restaurant, you decided to grow this family a bit more, so you snapped your fingers, and...
125.title: Have him act like and think he's your mother.

13.content:
"Alternate universes..." you say to yourself.

You replayed what the voice said in your mind. You can basically hop between universes, no matter what it is.

All you had to do was focus on who you want to become in that universe and snap your fingers.

"Sounds simple enough," you say to yourself.

You focused and snapped your fingers, and you ended up in...
13.title: Alternate universes

132.content:
To what universe do you intend to travel?


Mobius (the planet "Sonic the Hedgehog" lives on)

British Earth (a universe in which all live-action British TV shows are real; i.e. "Doctor Who," "Sherlock," "Monty Python," ect.)
132.title: A TV show.

135.content: Did you land in an anime or cartoon?
135.title: An anime/cartoon.

info.brief_description: Mind control, shape shifting, what more can you want?
info.description:
This story was based on a dream I actually just had not 5 minutes ago.

Well, it's based on that dream. I changed things around a bit.

Your name is James Wakefield. You're an 18 year old Caucasian male. You just moved to a new town to start a new life; you'll be going to the local community college there as well in a month.

You recently had a dream where a voice said you can not only shapeshift just by snapping your fingers, but you can mind control and hop between alternate universes.

When you shapeshift, the person you shapeshift into, regardless of location, turns into you, clothes and all. They always assume they've looked like that, and will continue on their way.

You can not swap others, or shapeshift others. You're the only one that can shapeshift.

Now, I know some of you are going "BUT I LIKE TO SWAP OTHERS" and I understand that. Which is why I'm taking a new approach at the always loved idea of swapping others. You can mind control.

You can do things as simple as having your college teacher give you an A on the test you purposely failed, to more amusing things like having a high school football player act as if he was a 6 year old girl.

To mind control, you just snap your fingers and results will occur; they will stay in that state of mind until you change them back.

Now, for the fun part; alternate universes. You have your universe you're in right now, but you can jump into anything; tv shows, movies, magazines, comic books, the works. As long as whatever you jump in has a story, you're fine.

Now, when you hop into another universe, you have to know who you'll take on the appearance as; once you know, just snap your fingers and you'll find yourself in that universe, in the form of that person.

RULES:
I'm usually not that strict on rules, but I feel I should enforce them.

1) Nothing too sexual. I don't want a detailed erotica story. Save that for another interactive. If they have sex, say they did. That's it.

2) This rule is similar to rule 1. Don't play with yourself. You don't need to shapeshift and play with yourself every single time i.e. playing with boobs, touching your new vagina, and so on. The only exception is groping yourself when you first hop in, but then you stop playing with yourself.

3) Like rule 2, this isn't an erotica story. If you think it'd fit well for an erotica story, don't post it. I WILL EDIT YOUR POST.

Should you have any questions, feel free to message me.
